short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate browser interactions by recording and replaying user actions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate your browser - record and replay your actions seamlessly for enhanced productivity. A no code automation solution. 

Effortlessly automate repetitive tasks like filling forms, navigating websites, or testing workflows, all with a powerful interface packed with advanced customization options.

Key Features: 

üé• Record Actions: Seamlessly record all your keystrokes and mouse clicks on the current tab with just a click of a button. Capture everything from simple navigation to complex workflows.

‚ñ∂Ô∏è Simulate Actions: Replay your recorded actions with precision. Watch as Action Replay simulates your keystrokes and clicks exactly as you performed them, making repetitive tasks a breeze.

üìã Multiple Script Slots: Save and manage multiple workflows, making it easy to switch between tasks.

üîÇ Script Looping: Repeat actions seamlessly with the loop functionality, perfect for iterative tasks.

üõ†Ô∏è Advanced Editing: Modify scripts with an intuitive UI - update selectors, tweak keystrokes, or dynamically add new actions.

‚è© Customizable Playback Speed: Adjust the playback speed of your clicks & keystrokes to suit your needs, whether you want to run them in real-time or speed through repetitive tasks quickly.

‚öôÔ∏è Error Handling: Built-in error handling and debug logging ensures smooth playback by skipping or retrying failed actions, providing a reliable automation experience.

Your Data, Your Privacy:

üîí Complete Local Storage: All actions and scripts are stored securely on your device. This ensures total privacy and allows you to use the extension for sensitive tasks, like logging into accounts with secure passwords.
üõ°Ô∏è No Data Collection: Action Replay does not collect, transmit, or store any of your data. You maintain full control over your information, giving you the peace of mind to automate safely.
‚úÖ Safe for Personal and Professional Use: Whether you‚Äôre managing accounts, testing workflows, or automating repetitive tasks, your data remains private and secure.

Use Cases:

* Form Automation: Breeze through repetitive forms, from surveys to registrations.
* E-commerce Efficiency: Automate checkouts and ensure error-free transactions.
* Website Testing: Simulate user interactions for testing and debugging.
* Data Entry: Record and replay input processes for speed and accuracy.
